Numinous Cascade.name: Numinous Cascade
Numinous Cascade.flavor: Brilliant fire streams from you to burn your foe, and cascades past that foe to sear another. Radiance dances across both targets, guiding the attacks of your allies against them.
Numinous Cascade.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the primary target.
Numinous Cascade.secondaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of the primary target
Numinous Cascade.secondaryOnHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the secondary target.

Sunburst Bulwark.name: Sunburst Bulwark
Sunburst Bulwark.flavor: Radiant fire erupts from you, bringing respite to your allies and searing your foes, rooting your enemies in place.
Sunburst Bulwark.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Sunburst Bulwark.effect: Each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge and regains additional hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Blinding Ward.name: Blinding Ward
Blinding Ward.flavor: Brilliant fire erupts from your ally at your word, blinding the enemy who sought to harm your friend.
Blinding Ward.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll against you or your ally
Blinding Ward.effect: The target is blinded until the start of your next turn.
